nodes.text: A vibrobrush was a type of hairbrush. Around 34 ABY, the Chadra-Fan Kriki acquired a vibrobrush in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu and gave it to the human Vi Moradi to use on her wig.
Vibrobrushes were first mentioned in the novel Galaxy's Edge: Black Spire, which was written by Delilah S. Dawson and published in 2019.
